verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are my destiny
Living inside of me
Now that You set me free
I hunger for You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Peace I've been longing for
Flow through me now once more
My heart's an open door
Proclaim to the world

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy holy Lord God Almighty
We bow down before Thee
To worship Your name
Jesus Savior my heart is Yours Lord
Pour out Your mercy
Come and fill this place

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your love and nothing less
Conquers my emptiness
Unending faithfulness
I lift up my hands and cryVerse 1
You are my destiny
Living inside of me
Now that You set me free
I hunger for You
